title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 72-1.5 - Inspection and inspection fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 72-1.5 - Inspection and inspection fees

State Regulations
(a) A person operating a tanning facility shall allow the Department and PIO representatives access to conduct inspections and access to all equipment and records as may be necessary to determine compliance with these rules at any time the facility is in operation. (b) An inspection fee not to exceed $ 200 per ultraviolet radiation device will be charged once per biennial licensing period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
72-1.5

New

York State Register January 5, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 01, eff. 1/5/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
